text:
A heated argument on who was the best footballer, Lionel Messi or Cristiano Ronaldo, led a Nigerian youth to allegedly murder his fellow national at Nallasopara in Palghar district of Maharashtra, the police said on Monday. Michael Chukwuma (24) has been arrested in this connection, they said.

The incident took place on Sunday. The victim, Obinna Duruchukwu, had celebrated his 34th birthday just a day before, police said.

“A group of Nigerians had gathered to celebrate Obinna’s birthday in Nallasopara. The celebrations that started from Saturday night continued till the next morning,” Inspector Prakash Birajdar of Tulinj police station said.

“On Sunday, Obinna and Michael were discussing football players. One was a fan of Messi, the other of Ronaldo. During their argument on which one of the two footballers was a better player, Michael lost his temper and picked up a beer bottle and threw it at Obinna. The bottle did not hit the victim and broke into pieces,” he said.

Fuming with rage, Michael picked up a glass splinter and slit Obinna’s throat. — PTI
title: Man killed over argument on Messi and Ronaldo
